original_text: But Johanan the son of Kareah and all the commanders of the forces took all the remnant of Judah who had returned to live in the land of Judah from all the nations to which they had been driven—
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 모든 군 지휘관이 유다의 남은 자 곧 쫓겨났던 여러 나라 가운데에서 유다 땅에 살려 하여 돌아온 자

sentences.original_text: But Johanan the son of Kareah
and all the commanders of the forces
took all the remnant of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 모든 남은 자들을 데리고 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: who had returned to live in the land of Judah
to which they had been driven
